trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox> and subscribes to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.SelectionChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>並訂閱<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.SelectionChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: It uses the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.SelectionChangedEventArgs> to find the selected item in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: 它會使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.SelectionChangedEventArgs>尋找選取項目中的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>。

trans-unit.source: The items that were unselected during this event.
trans-unit.target: 這個事件期間未選取的項目。

trans-unit.source: The items that were selected during this event.
trans-unit.target: 這個事件期間已選取的項目。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.SelectionChangedEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.SelectionChangedEventArgs" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox> and subscribes to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.SelectionChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>並訂閱<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.SelectionChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: It uses the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.SelectionChangedEventArgs> to find the selected item in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: 它會使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.SelectionChangedEventArgs>尋找選取項目中的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a list that contains the items that were selected.
trans-unit.target: 取得包含已選取之項目的清單。

trans-unit.source: The items that were selected since the last time the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.SelectionChanged" /> event occurred.
trans-unit.target: 自從上一次發生 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.SelectionChanged" /> 事件以來所選取的項目。
要叫用 (Invoke) 的處理常式。

trans-unit.source: The current object along the event's route.
trans-unit.target: 目前在事件路徑上的物件。

trans-unit.source: Performs the proper type casting to call the type-safe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.SelectionChangedEventHandler" /> delegate for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.SelectionChanged" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 執行適當的型別轉換，以呼叫 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.SelectionChangedEventHandler" /> 事件的型別安全 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.SelectionChanged" /> 委派。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox> and subscribes to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.SelectionChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>並訂閱<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.SelectionChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: It uses the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.SelectionChangedEventArgs> to find the selected item in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: 它會使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.SelectionChangedEventArgs>尋找選取項目中的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a list that contains the items that were unselected.
trans-unit.target: 取得包含未選取之項目的清單。

trans-unit.source: The items that were unselected since the last time the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.SelectionChanged" /> event occurred.
trans-unit.target: 自從上一次發生 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.SelectionChanged" /> 事件以來未選取的項目。
